caption.p: Binding orientation and 3-D interaction plot of putative bioactive compounds identified in the chloroform fraction of Eryngium caeruleum into active sites of homology model of Î±-glucosidase. (A) tocopherol (B) 2,5-Pyrrolidione, N-[(thienyl) acetyloxy] (C) Cyclohexene, 3-(1,5-dimethyl-4-hexenyl)-6-methylene, and (D) phytol.
